value.stringValue: New case has been created, but Account Owner is deactivated
This case was created based on an email from the police
This case was created based on an email from whitelisted email addresses
This case was accepted because it came from an consent withdrawn email from the customer.
This case was rejected because: 1) the email came from an auto reply email
This case was created manually and a receipt was sent to the email of the related contact
This case was accepted because it came from an email belonging to a contact who is marked as entitled to support:
This case was created based on an email sent to fixed-enterprise@telia.dk (priority FIXED).

rules.name: TRUE_myRule_1
rules.conditionLogic: 3 AND 4 AND (1 OR 2 OR 5 OR 6 OR 7 OR 8 OR 9 OR 10 OR 11 OR 12 OR 13 OR (14 AND 15 AND 16))

rightValue.stringValue: Vi har nu registreret din sag
Din forespørgsel har fået tildelt SagsID
RE: Imens du venter...?: Vi har dig ikke registreret som telefoniansvarlig
Vi har nu oprettet din sag med sagsnr.
Servicedesk kan nu oplyse, at din sag med sagsnummer

rules.label: TRUE_AutoReply check

rules.name: TRUE_Whitelist_telenor_3_tdc

Flow.description: Migrated from the CS: Automatic case receipt process using multiple criteria. Sends an email receipt when a case is created. For entitled contacts a confirmation template is used. For non-entitled contacts a reject template is used

formulas.name: notificationBodyInternalSupport
formulas.expression: {!$Record.CaseNumber} & " has been created for " & {!$Record.Account.Name} & " Account Owner is deactivated: " & {!$Record.Account.Owner.Username}
